original: Rāhu, bhikkhave, asurindo candimasūriyānaṁ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti.

original: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattārome samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti.

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti.

original: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.

original: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: tattha ṭhitaḥ tad adhimuttaḥ tad bahula vihārī a parihīnaḥ kālam kurumānaḥ brahmakāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati

original: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi gacchati tiracchānayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati.
analyzed: tattha puthujjanaḥ yāvatāyukam ṭhatvā yāvatakam tesam devānam āyu ppamāṇam tam sabbam khepetvā nirayam pi gacchati tiracchāna yonim pi gacchati pettivisayam pi gacchati

original: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena, yadidaṁ gatiyā upapattiyā sati.
analyzed: ayam kho bhikkhave visesaḥ ayam adhippayāsaḥ idam nānākaraṇam sutavataḥ ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena yat idam gatiyā upapattiyā sati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…

analyzed: accayaḥ ma bhante accagamāḥ yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathā akusala yā aham evam akāsi

original: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo ānando accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
analyzed: tassāḥ me bhante ayyaḥ ānandaḥ accayam accayataḥ paṭiggaṇhātu āyatim savarāya ati

original: “Taggha taṁ, bhagini, accayo accagamā, yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yā tvaṁ evamakāsi.
analyzed: tat ha te bhagini accayaḥ accagamā yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathāakusala yā tvam evam akāsi

original: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, bhagini, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi, taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
analyzed: yatas ca kho tva bhagini accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikarosi tam te mayam paṭiggaṇhāma

original: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
analyzed: vuddhi ha isā bhagini ariyassa vinaye yaḥ accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikaroti āyatim savaram āpajjati iti

original: “Sugato vā, bhikkhave, loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.

katamaḥ ca bhikkhave sugataḥ

original: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.

bhikkhave sugataḥ
katamaḥ ca bhikkhave sugata vinayaḥ

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti
bhikkhave sugata vinayo

original: Evaṁ sugato vā, bhikkhave, loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti.

original: Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: cattāro me bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya savattanti
katame cattāro

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū duggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhū duggahitam suttantam pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittehi pada byañjanehi

original: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
analyzed: dunnikkhittassa bhikkhave pada byañjanassa atthaḥ api dunnayaḥ hoti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: aya bhikkhave paṭhamaḥ dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dubbacā honti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhū dubbacāḥ honti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatāḥ akkhamāḥ appadakkhiṇa ggāhinaḥ anusāsani

analyzed: aya bhikkhave dutiyaḥ dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā, te na sakkaccaṁ suttantaṁ paraṁ vācenti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū bahu ssutāḥ āgata āgamāḥ dhamma dharāḥ vinaya dharāḥ mātikā dharā te na sakkaccam suttantam param vācenti

original: Tesaṁ accayena chinnamūlako suttanto hoti appaṭisaraṇo.

original: “Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ cattāro ānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
analyzed: sotānugatāna bhikkhave dhammāna vacasā paricitāna manasā anupekkhitāna diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānam cattāro ānisasā pāṭikaṅkhā
katame cattāro
idha bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammam pariyāpuṇāti

original: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
analyzed: sutta geyya veyyākaraṇa gātha udāna itivuttaka jātaka abbhutadhamma vedalla

original: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: tassa te dhammā sota anugatāḥ honti vacasā paricitāḥ manasā an upekkhitāḥ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so muṭṭhaḥ ati kālam kurumānaḥ aññataram devanikāyam upapajjati
tassa tattha sukhinaḥ dhamma padā plavanti
dandhaḥ bhikkhave satuppādaḥ

original: atha so satto khippaṁyeva visesagāmī hoti.
analyzed: atha saḥ satto khippayā iva visesa gāmī hoti

original: Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ ayaṁ paṭhamo ānisaṁso pāṭikaṅkho.
analyzed: sotā anugatāna bhikkhave dhammāna vacasā paricitāna manasā an upekkhitāna diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhānam ayam paṭhamaḥ ānisasaḥ pāṭikaṅkho

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammam pariyāpuṇāti

original: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
analyzed: sutta geyya veyyākaraṇa gātha udāna itivuttaka jātaka abbhutadhamma vedalla

original: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: tassa te dhammā sota anugatāḥ honti vacasā paricitāḥ manasā an upekkhitāḥ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so muṭṭhaḥ ati kālam kurumānaḥ aññataram devanikāyam upapajjati

original: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
analyzed: tassa tattha na ha iva kho sukhino dhamma padā plavanti

original: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.
analyzed: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetaḥ vasi pattaḥ deva parisāyam dhammaṃ deseti
tassa evam hoti

original: ‘ayaṁ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṁ pubbe brahmacariyaṁ acarin’ti.
analyzed: ayam vā so dhamma vinayaḥ yattha aham pubbe brahmacariyam acarinti
dandhaḥ bhikkhave satuppādaḥ

original: atha so satto khippameva visesagāmī hoti.
analyzed: atha so satto khippam eva visesa gāmī hoti
seyyathāpi bhikkhave purisaḥ kusalaḥ bheri saddassa
saḥ addhāna magga ppaṭipannaḥ bheri saddam suṇeyya

original: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
analyzed: tassa na ha iva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā

original: ‘bherisaddo nu kho, na nu kho bherisaddo’ti.
analyzed: bheri saddo nu kho na nu kho bheri saddo ti
atha kho bheri saddo tvā iva niṭṭham gaccheyya

analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu dhammam pariyāpuṇāti

analyzed: tassa te dhammā sota anugatāḥ honti vacasā paricitāḥ manasā an upekkhitāḥ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā

original: Sotānugatānaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṁ, vacasā paricitānaṁ, manasānupekkhitānaṁ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ ime cattāro ānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.

ṭhāna sutta
cattāri imāni bhikkhave ṭhānāni catūhi ṭhānehi veditabbāni
katamāni cattāri

original: Saṁvāsena, bhikkhave, sīlaṁ veditabbaṁ, tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññena.
analyzed: sa vāsena bhikkhave sīlam veditabba tat ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena

original: Saṁvohārena, bhikkhave, soceyyaṁ veditabbaṁ, tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññena.
analyzed: sa vohārena bhikkhave soceyyam veditabba tat ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena

original: Āpadāsu, bhikkhave, thāmo veditabbo, so ca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññena.
analyzed: āpadāsu bhikkhave thāmaḥ veditabbo so ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena

original: Sākacchāya, bhikkhave, paññā veditabbā, sā ca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññenāti.
analyzed: bhikkhave paññā veditabbā sā ca kho dīghena addhunā na manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena ati

original: ‘Saṁvāsena, bhikkhave, sīlaṁ veditabbaṁ, tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññenā’ti,
analyzed: sa vāsena bhikkhave sīlam veditabba tat ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvasamāno evaṁ jānāti:

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ kho ayamāyasmā khaṇḍakārī chiddakārī sabalakārī kammāsakārī, na santatakārī na santatavutti;
analyzed: dīgharattam kho ayam āyasmā khaṇḍa kārī chidda kārī sabala kārī kammāsa kārī na santata kārī na santata vutti
sīlesu dussīlaḥ ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā sīlavāti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvasamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave puggalaḥ puggalena saddhim savasamānaḥ evam jānāti

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ kho ayamāyasmā akhaṇḍakārī acchiddakārī asabalakārī akammāsakārī santatakārī santatavutti;
analyzed: dīgharattam kho ayam āyasmai akhaṇḍa kārī acchidda kārī a sabala kārī a kammāsa kārī santata kārī santata vutti
sīlesu sīlavāḥ ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā dussīlaḥ iti

original: ‘Saṁvāsena, bhikkhave, sīlaṁ veditabbaṁ, tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā,
analyzed: sa vāsena bhikkhave sīlam veditabba tat ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara

original: no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññenā’ti, iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena ati iti yat tat vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Saṁvohārena, bhikkhave, soceyyaṁ veditabbaṁ, tañca kho dīghena addhunā, na ittaraṁ; manasikarotā, no amanasikarotā; paññavatā, no duppaññenā’ti,
analyzed: sa vohārena bhikkhave soceyyam veditabba tat ca kho dīghena addhunā na ittara manasikarotā no a manasikarotā paññavatā no duppaññena ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvoharamāno evaṁ jānāti:

original: ‘aññathā kho ayamāyasmā ekena eko voharati, aññathā dvīhi, aññathā tīhi, aññathā sambahulehi;

vokkamati purima vohārā pacchima vohāra
a parisuddha vohāraḥ ayam āyasmā na ayam āyasmā parisuddha vohāraḥ iti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvoharamāno evaṁ jānāti:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave puggalaḥ puggalena saddhim evam jānāti

original: ‘yatheva kho ayamāyasmā ekena eko voharati, tathā dvīhi, tathā tīhi, tathā sambahulehi.

original: Tatonidānaṁ purisaṁ dukkhavedaniyā āsavā assaveyyuṁ abhisamparāyan”ti.

original: Ayañceva kho pana āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa vappena sakkena nigaṇṭhasāvakena saddhiṁ antarākathā vippakatā hoti.

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, ajjatagge yo me bālesu nigaṇṭhesu pasādo taṁ mahāvāte vā ophuṇāmi nadiyā vā sīghasotāya pavāhemi.

original: Seyyathāpi, sāḷha, puriso nadiṁ taritukāmo tiṇhaṁ kuṭhāriṁ ādāya vanaṁ paviseyya.

original: Yepi te, sāḷha, samaṇabrāhmaṇā aparisuddhakāyasamācārā aparisuddhavacīsamācārā aparisuddhamanosamācārā aparisuddhājīvā, abhabbā te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya.
analyzed: ye pi te sāḷha samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ a parisuddha kāya samācārāḥ a parisuddha vacī samācārāḥ a parisuddha manaḥ samācārāḥ a parisuddha ājīvāḥ abhabbāḥ te ñāṇa dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāya

original: Ye ca kho te, sāḷha, samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapojigucchāvādā na tapojigucchāsārā na tapojigucchāallīnā viharanti, bhabbā te oghassa nittharaṇāya.
